SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_deal_user (id, time, order_no, user_id, deal_type, operation_type, amount, balance, freeze, summary) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dealType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{freeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_deal_user set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, deal_type = #{dealType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freeze = #{freeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, order_no, user_id, deal_type, operation_type, amount, balance, freeze, summary from t_deal_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, time, order_no, user_id, deal_type, operation_type, amount, balance, freeze, summary from t_deal_user
